name: Aran's Bike Trip
description:
Aran's Bike Trip is a video game about a short bike touring trip. Go on a 2 day ride in the Netherlands and explore the Dutch countryside, woods and heathlands through a whole bunch of 360 photos. It's a short, relaxing point & click-ish game with a travel narrative. Will Aran live to tell the tale?? (spoiler: he does)

Features
  • A travel vlog video game with about 30 minutes of gameplay
  • Many 360º photos to checkout (100+)
  • Relaxing tunes to listen to
